policies.involuntary_refund:
, delays >2 hours, or denied boarding: Full refund, voucher, or rebooking offered.
• If taxes were not paid to authorities, they may be refunded; otherwise, the customer must claim them directly.
• All refunds are processed to original form of payment, except cash which may be refunded as an Arajet voucher.
• Fare is non-refundable outside the above exceptions.
• Refunds processed within 30 days of request.
policies.involuntary_reissue:
Flight date/time changes are allowed:
• Must be made at least 24 hours prior to departure.
• Subject to applicable service fee and fare difference.
• Route changes are not permitted.
• Existing services (like seats) will transfer when possible.
• If not available, an alternative or refund of that service may be offered.
policies.voluntary_refund:
Refunds are only permitted under specific conditions:
• Within 24 hours of booking and at least 7 days prior to departure: Full refund of the fare (excluding service fees already rendered).
policies.medical_refund:
No formal waiver code system. Changes outside published conditions require manual review.
• Involuntary changes (cancellation, delay, etc.): Waiver not required—eligible for refund or rebooking.
• Voluntary changes follow bundle fare rules with applicable fees and fare difference.
policies.name_change:
Name changes allowed under these rules:
• One free name change per 20 pax in group bookings.
• Must be requested at least 24 hours before departure.
• If the correction is 3 characters or less and requested before check-in, no fee applies.
• Changes of 4+ characters or complete name changes incur a fee and fare difference.
policies.group_booking:
• Group bookings: Minimum 21 pax.
• Series: 4 groups minimum of 16 pax each (12 pax minimum to maintain group status).
• Passenger names due 10 days before departure (20 days for Canada/Saint Martin).
• Not bookable within 7 days of departure.
• One free name change per 20 pax.
• Infants: 5% of adult fare plus tax.
• Full payment schedule applies.
• Additional services/baggage not included unless confirmed. For Group requests 21 passengers traveling together or more, agents need to register in the airlines' Sales Portal: https://ezy.arajet.com/en/ta-log and submit requests from there. Follow ups can be made at groups@arajet.com
policies.infant_policy:
• Infants: 8 days to under 2 years old.
• May travel on adult's lap for 5% of fare + tax.
• Infants are not eligible for baggage or additional services.
• Adults traveling with an infant receive one extra personal item and may check one stroller or car seat free of charge.
• Infants must be booked; documentation required to confirm age.
policies.baggage_policy:
• One personal item included: max 6kg, 40x25x20cm.
• Carry-on baggage: one piece up to 12kg, 56x46x25cm (must be pre-purchased or included in bundle).
• Checked baggage: up to 3 pieces, max 32kg and 366cm linear each. Fees apply unless included in bundle.
• Fragile or valuable items (electronics, musical instruments) should not be checked; limited liability applies.
• Musical instruments and sports equipment accepted with fees, size/weight restrictions, and release of liability.
• Compensation for lost/damaged baggage: up to 1131 SDRs (Montreal Convention).
policies.seat_request_policy:
• Advanced seat selection available for a fee depending on bundle or service.
• Some seats (exit rows, bulkhead) have eligibility restrictions (age, ability to assist in evacuation, etc.).
• Customers with medical or special needs may receive designated seats without additional cost.
• If moved for operational/safety reasons, seat fees may be refunded as a voucher.
• Emergency exit seats cannot be assigned to passengers under 16, pregnant women, or those traveling with infants or pets.
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy:
Arajet offers a 24-hour risk-free cancellation policy:
• Must be requested within 24 hours of booking AND at least 7 days prior to departure.
• After this window, bookings are subject to the standard refund and change policies outlined in the bundle fare conditions.
• No same-day void beyond that window.

support_contacts._note: For internal use only. Do not include in autoresponse emails.
